TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InertiaTranslationBehavior extends System.Object

summary.span: 控制平移操作在慣性期間的減速。

span.span: Controls deceleration on a translation manipulation during inertia.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您指定慣性時，平移操作的運作方式。The class specifies how a translation manipulation behaves when it is inertia. 使用屬性中的事件，以執行下列動作：Use the property in the event to do the following: - 一開始先設定時，指定慣性的初始速度屬性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 指定的操作所需的位置，藉由設定的慣性結束時屬性。Specify the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 設定以指定所需的減速程度的慣性屬性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 設定或，但非兩者。Set either the or the , but not both. 當您設定其中一個屬性時，另一個屬性變更為如果它的值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 如需有關操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需回應操作的應用程式的範例，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## Examples 下列範例所示事件處理常式，並設定為平移、 擴充和旋轉在慣性期間所需的減速程度。The following example shows the event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia. 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationinertiastarting)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationinertiastarting)]

summary.span: 取得或設定直線移動變慢的速率 (以每平方毫秒 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 數為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the rate the linear movement slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per squared millisecond.

span.span: The rate the linear movement slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per squared millisecond.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定所需的減速程度的慣性。Use the property to specify the desired deceleration of the inertia. 設定或，但非兩者。Set either the or the , but not both. 當您設定其中一個屬性時，另一個屬性變更為如果它的值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 如需有關操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需回應操作的應用程式的範例，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

span.span: The property is set to infinity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用慣性結束時，指定操作所需的位置的屬性。Use the property to specify the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends. 設定或，但非兩者。Set either the or the , but not both. 當您設定其中一個屬性時，另一個屬性變更為如果它的值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 如需有關操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需回應操作的應用程式的範例，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

span.span: The property is set to infinity.
